```{r}

library(tidyverse)

walt_disney_movies <-read.csv("/Users/janthinatan/Desktop/NM2207/Week 9 /walt_disney_movies.csv")

glimpse(walt_disney_movies)
```

```{R}

#Clean data 

library(lubridate)
walt_disney_movies <- na.omit(walt_disney_movies)

#Convert Release.date to Date format
walt_disney_movies$Release.date <- as.Date(walt_disney_movies$Release.date)

#Summarize average box office sales by year
box_office_summary <- walt_disney_movies %>%
  group_by(Year = year(Release.date)) %>%
  summarise(Avg_Box_Office = mean(Box.office, na.rm = TRUE))
  
box_office_summary
```
